QuestData.Title: Don't Play with Matches
QuestData.Description:
These Venture Co. thugs set flame to the very oils they harvest. They hope to drive us from this land.
Their plan has a flaw. If a great wave extinguished every torch, their oil could not be lit. You can be our great wave!
Extinguish all the flames here, and we shall be victorious this day.
QuestData.LogDescription: Eliminate $1oa Venture Co. Flame Starters and $2oa Venture Co. Oilers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Get to work, the battle is not won yet!
QuestData.RewardText: The war has just begun, but it was a great first victory!
